import YASHE from'yashe';//Singleton Pattern
var Editor=function(){function EditorClass(){this.getYashe=function(){return this.yashe;};this.setYashe=function(yashe){this.yashe=yashe;};this.getPrefixes=function(){var yashe=Editor.getInstance().getYashe();var definedPrefixes=yashe.getDefinedPrefixes();var prefixes='';for(var pre in definedPrefixes){prefixes+='PREFIX '+pre+':    <'+definedPrefixes[pre]+'>\n';}prefixes+='\n';return prefixes;};this.draw=function(shapes){var newContent=this.getPrefixes();shapes.forEach(function(element){newContent+=element.toString();});this.getYashe().setValue(newContent);};}var instance;return{getInstance:function getInstance(){if(!instance){instance=new EditorClass();}return instance;}};}();export default Editor;
